description.narrative: To assist Nanning Municipality, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, in arresting further deterioration of surface water quality in selected urban centers by expanding the coverage of wastewater treatment services, carrying out environmental rehabilitation of rivers, and improving the institutional and regulatory capacities of the municipal agencies.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :PA Annex A, 8(a) (iii) | Description :GNWC, NXICC and NCWIC should prepare and furnish to the Bank, no laterthan 6 months after the end of each fiscal year, audited financial statements or records and accounts. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Annex A, 9(b) | Description :GNWC shall, on the basis of forecast prepared by the company, review therequirements before September 30 each year in terms of total revenues exceeding operating cost and debt service. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Section I, C.3(b) | Description :Furnish to the Bank by March 15 and September 15 semi-annual monitoring andevaluation reports with respect to the EMP or any revisions proposed in documents. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Section I, C.3(b) | Description :Furnish to the Bank by March 15 and September 15 semi-annual monitoring andevaluation reports with respect to the RAP and RPF or any revisions proposed in documents. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PA Section I, D.1(a) | Description :Subsidiary Loan Agreement between Nanning and Guangxi Nanning Water CompanyLtd. (GNWC) | Due Date :18-Mar-2011

Finance Agreement :PA Section I, D.1(b) | Description :Subsidiary Agency Agreement between Nanning and Nanning Communication andWater Conservancy Investment Company Ltd. (NCWCIC) | Due Date :18-Mar-2011
Finance Agreement :PA Section I, D.1(b) | Description :Subsidiary Agency Agreement between Nanning and Nanning Xiangsihu Investment& Constructions Company Ltd. (NXICC) | Due Date :18-Mar-2011
Finance Agreement :PA Section II, A.1 | Description :Prepare and submit Semi-Annual Progress Reports no later than March 15 andSeptember 15 each year. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Section II, B.2 | Description :Have the project financial statements audited every year by independentauditors and furnished to the Borrower and the Bank no later than 6 months after the period. | Frequency :Yearly
